original_text: Before God made the world, he chose us to be his people because of Christ. He chose us so that we would please him. Because we belong to Christ, God accepts us as completely good. This shows how much he loves us.
korean_text: 곧 창세 전에 그리스도 안에서 우리를 택하사 우리로 사랑 안에서 그 앞에 거룩하고 흠이 없게 하시려고

sentences.original_text: he chose us to be his people
He chose us so that we would please him
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 우리가 그를 기쁘시게 하도록 우리를 택하셨다

sentences.original_text: God accepts us as completely good
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님은 우리를 완전히 선한 자로 받아주신다

sentences.original_text: This shows how much he loves us
sentences.korean_translation: 이것이 그가 우리를 얼마나 사랑하시는지를 보여준다
